if(faction != $albfaction) {
	mes "[^0000ffShop Owner^000000]";
	mes "Psh...";
	close;
	}
callshop "AlbGear01",0;
}
-	shop	AlbGear01	139,2101:-1,2103:-1,2401:-1,2403:-1,2405:-1,2501:-1,2503:-1,2505:-1,2203:-1,2201:-1,2205:-1,2226:-1,2301:-1,2303:-1,2305:-1,2321:-1,2328:-1,2332:-1,2307:-1,2309:-1,2312:-1,2314:-1,2628:-1
